channel.title: Skiing on Hanna
channel.description: Recent content in Skiing on Hanna

item.title: A Restless Backpacking Guide to Western Europe
item.description: There is no better way to experience half a continent than to race through it at lightning speed and squeeze as many destinations as possible into two and a half weeks. If you keep moving fast enough, you hardly have time to realize how exhausted you are, and you get to experience life changing moments like showing up for a 6am flight only to realize your passport is missing.
